name: Malefic Town
text: While this card is face-up on the field, "Malefic World" cards you control are unaffected by other cards' effects. Once per turn: If there is no face-up Field Spell, you can set 1 "Malefic" Field Spell from your Deck or GY. Once per turn: If a "Malefic" monster(s) you control are destroyed by battle or card effect: you can Special Summon 1 banished Synchro Monster ignoring its summoning conditions, then its effects are negated.
